name: Bug Bite Billy
description:
Blast your way through hoards of overgrown bugs and galactic hives with an ever-growing arsenal of weapons at your disposal in this action-packed 2D top-down shooter!!

The game is being developed by myself for now but I will continue to update the game. There's already plans for more updates, which will be shared in the Devlog for more details on these updates regularly. Expect to fight new enemies, with new guns, and take on more bosses!

Consider donating or sharing if you enjoy the game to support its continued development. Every little bit helps!
